name: Kitty Quest [Under Construction]
description:
Escort your human through the magic forest and protect them from bad spirits in this mystical and cute dungeon crawler!

Gameplay Loops:

1. Enter forest area 

2. Dispel all bad spirits

3. Protect your human, who cannot see the bad spirits

4. Repeat

1. You or human is harmed by bad spirits

2. Human gets scared 

3. Purr to calm human

1. Find special power up

2. Use special power up to fight bad spirits

How to Play:

- Use WASD to move your cat around, dodging enemies around you

- Press F to pause the game

- Click the mouse while aiming at enemies to kill them 

- Walk into your human companion to calm them and have them heal you

- Make your way to the clearing in the left of the map to complete the game
